mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY VS_NO) AS VS_ROWNUMBER, vs_no, VS_TITLE, VS_WRITER, VS_CONTENT, VS_DATE, VS_IMG1, VS_IMG2 FROM COMMUNITY_VS ORDER BY VS_NO DESC LIMIT #{listcnt} OFFSET #{start};
SELECT * FROM COMMUNITY_VS ORDER BY VS_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_VS (VS_TITLE, VS_WRITER, VS_CONTENT, VS_DATE, VS_IMG1, VS_IMG2) VALUES (#{vs_title}, #{vs_writer}, #{vs_content}, current_date, #{vs_img1}, #{vs_img2});
mapper.update: UPDATE VSIMG SET V_NO = #{v_no} WHERE VS_NO = #{vs_no} AND V_SELECTOR = #{v_selector}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM VSIMG WHERE V_SELECTOR = #{v_selector} AND VS_NO = #{vs_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VSIMG WHERE VS_NO = #{vs_no} AND V_NO = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VSIMG WHERE VS_NO = #{vs_no} AND V_NO = 2;
SELECT * FROM COMMENT_VS WHERE VS_NO = #{vs_no} ORDER BY vs_cno DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT_VS SET VS_COMMENT = #{vs_comment} WHERE VS_NO = #{vs_no} AND VS_CNO = #{vs_cno};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENT_VS WHERE VS_NO = #{vs_no} AND VS_CNO = #{vs_cno};
